notes:
[Blight Herder] looks colourless, but is actually a blue-black card that's really easy to cast, because it is fantastic when you can reliably process, but only pretty good when you can't. I'd take it here and keep an eye out for [Benthic Infiltrators]  and [Mist Intruders].

Other than that [Eldrazi Skyspawner] is the probably the best blue common.
